item.title: AP, Telangana paddy floods Raichur market — thanks to ease of trade
item.description: <![CDATA[Pic: Raichur APMC has adopted an intermittent procurement approach as 50,000 quintals of paddy is reaching APMC dailyRaichur: Large consignments of paddy have started reaching the procurement centre here — the largest paddy APMC in Karnataka — from neighbouring Andhra Pradesh and Telangana.Due to agricultural products not fetching appropriate prices in the open market, the govts of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana have established procurement centres within their states. While the Union govt has set...]]>
item.author: Chamaraj Savadi
